mapper.sql: id, student_no, name, gender, phone, email, major, class_name, grade, education_system, enrollment_date, graduation_date, current_year, current_semester, current_academic_year, status, create_time, update_time, deleted
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_student (student_no, name, gender, phone, email, major, class_name, grade, education_system, enrollment_date, graduation_date, current_year, current_semester, current_academic_year, status, create_time, update_time, deleted) VALUES (#{studentNo}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{major}, #{className}, #{grade}, #{educationSystem}, #{enrollmentDate}, #{graduationDate}, #{currentYear}, #{currentSemester}, #{currentAcademicYear}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{deleted})
mapper.select: SELECT FROM sys_student WHERE id = #{id} AND deleted = 0
SELECT FROM sys_student WHERE student_no = #{studentNo} AND deleted = 0

deleted = 0
